feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Master Data Governance
feed.subtitle: SAP Master Data Governance Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Can we create Key Mappings for multiple systems in MDG Consolidation?
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Can anyone tell me if we can create Key Mappings for multiple source systems while doing dataload via MDG Consolidation? The reason why I am asking this, because I do not see any option to put multiple source system names in the Consolidation UI. There is only one source system's name that we can put.

Your valuable advice is greatly appreciated.

Thanks!! T

entry.title: How to assign roles to Consolidation steps ?
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Can anyone help me have the answers of the following questions?

1) We assign roles to the Central Governance through Decision tables or Dyn Agent Det badi. Is there any similar way we can assign roles to the process template steps in Consolidation and Mass Processing?

2) Also I have a requirement to hide specific process template steps for specific roles . How would we achieve it?

Any help would be much appreciated.

Thanks, T

entry.title: Creating a Supplier Hierarchy ?
entry.content:
Hello experts,

We implementing MDG on S/4 HANA, where we need to create Hierarchies for Supplier master data. As per my little understanding, I think first we need to create the hierarchies in MDG and then the task of assigning suppliers or business partners to the hierarchies will come. Should we be creating those hierarchies at BP level or supplier level. 

Can any one of you tell me or guide me as to how we should create this hierarchy for supplier. I can see a lot of CR Types available from standard.

1) which CR types to use from the following. My assumption says either BPHP1  or BPHP2 to be used. I could be wrong too.

                    BP1P2                  Create Bus. Partner w. Hry. Assignment

                    BPHP1                  Process Business Partner Hierarchies 

                    BPHP2                  Process Business Partner Hierarchies

                    SUPPL1P2           Create Supplier w. Hierarchy Assignment

2) Since we are doing this in MDG on S/4 HANA, should we create hierarchies at BP level or supplier level?  

Thanks, T

entry.title: can i write custom entity with Governance API?
entry.content: i want to write values in custom Entity when data comes from SOA Inbound for Supplier at Company code level.is it possible to write custom entity using Governance API ?

entry.title: MDG CBA Object Component Configuration xxx does not exist
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We tried to hide fields dynamically according to CR type with CBA instead of coding.

First we had problem of missing fields in UIBB. Even field set as visible in component configuration page, when we opened the CR, field doesn't show up on screen.

  • Tried to delete adaptation and create again but couldn't get any solution.
  • Even deleted all adaptations in order to use base configuration but still field is missing.
  • Checked BaDI's that might effect field properties but there aren't any referencing point.
  • Checked and deleted all personalizations.
  • Also clearing UI metadata didn't help.

I figured out that deleted adaptations still take place in system via SE84->Web Dynpro->Component Configurations. I deleted unnecessary configurations via right click and delete by hoping missing fields will return. Then our problem problem continued to increase. We faced an error as Object Component Configuration xxx does not exist.

With this error i can't select, change, add or delete adaptations. Tried to re-create error referencing number of Component Configuration but of course it didn't help ðŸ™‚  So the page has become unusable, can't click anywhere anymore.

If a similar situation has happened to you or if there is a direction that you think can contribute to the solution, I would be very pleased.

entry.title: Enhanement on BP REL Handler class : MDG
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

For one of our requirement, we need to filter the relationship category and observed that when we open the customer in MDG UI, it lookup on class CL_MDG_BS_BP_HANDLER and method QUERY_BP_REL.

Observed that there is a select query inside this method manipulates it.

Checked few of the SAP NOTES and observed there is no filteration in terms of fetching entry for relationship.

Hope, we can do the implicit enhancement for this guy to do the filteration.

NOTE: We dont want to do the filteration post select query

Kindly suggest the same. Thanks

Block : uibb : relationship

entry.title: Update work center with new activity type using different UoM - MTN vs L
entry.content:
Greetings of the day PP Experts,

Requesting to share your expertise to understand, when we change/add new Activity type to an existing work center with different Unit of Measure (UoM) and also please help me to understand how it impacts the routing and other dependent workflow like any exiting planned or prod orders.

Actual scenario is there is a work center (Ex: ABC1122) which is being utilized with only 1 activity (Ex: ABC111) with UoM as MTN (Metric Ton). Now, the requirement is changing the Activity type (Ex: ABC121) with UoM as L (Liters) this with effective 3rd Quater (let say from June month) and stop using the current activity type (Ex: ABC111).    

Here, I want to understand if I make changes in work center by adding new activity type (EX: ABC121) with different UoM (liters).  Is there any impact on exiting routing & Planned /prod Orders? 

I recommended to set up a new work center with new activity type and use it effective June. However, my client is requirement to use the same work center and requesting to change the activity type. 

I have traced out there are 6 routing currently using this work center (ABC1122) with t-cde: CA80. when I try to add activity type with UOM as L in work center. I am getting below error at routing level "Enter a unit for dimension Mass for the standard value XXXXXX". 

Prior to posting here I have gone a few blogs and similar scenarios in our SAP Community however I didn't find the relevant one. 

Requesting the PP experts to share your inputs on the impact if we use the same work center by changing the Activity type.

entry.title: SAP MDG open change request in edit mode via link from E-Mail
entry.content:
Hi,

we have setup SAP MDG-M and inform the user via E-Mail notification about a change request/WF step.

In this E-Mail there is the link to the CR. If the user is clicking on that link, the CR will open in display mode.

Now the users asked if it is possible to open the CR in edit mode when clicking on the link.

Do you know if this is possible? If so, what needs to be done?

Regards

entry.title: Which HDB Schema holds all the MDG Consolidation Source tables of BP, Supplier and Customer ?
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We are trying to do a dataload by extracting data from ECC source systems and load them onto the Consolidation source tables in MDG (ie; BUT000_SRC, LFA1_SRC tables etc).  We need to know what the name of that "HDB Schema" is that holds these source tables in the underlying HANA Database. 

Can anyone help me with the HDB Schema name?

Thanks, T

entry.title: while creating scheduling agreement getting error as "IGST required fir different state"
entry.content:
I enter t code ME31L after in next screen I enter vendor, plant, purchase org, storage location and enter. In next screen I enter valadity end date and payment term and enter. In next screen i enter material and quantity. where i got errror as "IGST required for different state". but i did not move to next screen where actually i want to enter taxcode. but same id I login to different dekstop where i did not get that error. ial 

I tried same process with different materials but I didn't get error. the error is getting for that one specific material only.

Please help me to solve this issue

entry.title: Field no longer exists in reuse active area/ Field created in reuse active area
entry.content:
While adding values in the 'Incompatible or Required Parts or Application' field and updating the material, I receive an error message after saving, as shown in the screenshot."

I added these fields in the Manage Material Governance app using data model extension and UI extension in MDG."

entry.title: Change documents of Active Area in "Manage Material" app
entry.content:
Hi guys,

if you go to the "Manage Material" app and select a material you can go to the change documents of this material.

But this will only show the changes done via a CR.

If you go to "Display Change Documents" app you are able to include the change documents of active area.

Is it possible to include the change documents of active area in the "Manage Material" app?

Regards

entry.title: FIORI Tiles Language Translation
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I am able to maintain Translation for Space, Page, Section and Tile using se63. But Tile translation is not working for Custom Tile.

SE63 -> Translation -> ABAP Objects -> Transport Object

R3TR UIAD App_descriptor_ID

Maintained in the below Translation, it's not reflecting in the Fiori screen. cleared Global, Client Cache still no use. Please let us know is it the right process.

Thanks & Regards,

Prasad.

entry.title: Mass Processing Error 'Changing worklist content failed'
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am trying to upload an XLSX file and do a mass processing via "Start Mass Processing - Business Partner" which follows the proper file template. After uploding the file when I am clicking on SAVE button, I am getting the following error(screenshot attached also).

Error : Changing worklist content failed

I found a similar issue on the SAP community (https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/sap-mdg-changing-worklist-content-failed-mass-processing/qaq-p/13866973) and implemented the OSS note 3098273 mentioned there, but still no luck.

It would be great if anyone of you can shed some light on it.

Thanks, T

entry.title: Changed MDG data entries are not getting captured into this table mdgv_cp_bo_sys
entry.content:
Hello Team,

Entries are not saved for BP changes into table mdgv_cp_bo_sys, previously prior to system RISE migration we did not face this issue. Wondering ever anyone faced this issue?

configurations on DRFIMG and MDGIMG were not changed during the issue period of time.

entry.title: How to load MDC Source tables?
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have a question on dataload using MDG Consolidation process. We have multiple ECC source systems from where we need to load vendor data(total 300K from all ECC source systems) into MDG Hub on S/4 HANA. I am trying to understand what would be the best practice to load the SRC tables(LFA1_SRC, BUT000_SRC etc etc) so that I can trigger the Consolidation process from MDG after SRC tables are populated from the source systemsâ€¦should we use an ETL tool like SAP DS or this OSS note abap program (https://launchpad.support.sap.com/#/notes/2233142) to load those SRC tables? 

I need an urgent help in this regard. Thanks in advance for your advice.

entry.title: label data view in SAP MDG Material.
entry.content:
Hi

Can anyone help me with information about how to add Label data view in SAP MDG Material?

This view is available in S4 side as standard. Do we need to do data model extension?

entry.title: Master Data Integration - Cloud Foundry Runtime / Spaces - yes or no
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm receiving mixed signals here:

  • In SAP Master Data Integration, the "vanilla" documentation says, to create applications / service instances per app without a space and using runtime "other"
  • A scenario specific help, e.g. for Digital Manufacturing however states to use a space
  • I saw that Business Process Orchestrations needs spaces

Do you / shall I use spaces? If I later need to onboard BPO, can I still do this even if I deployed the instances without space at first?

Thanks and cheers

Jens

entry.title: Post Upgrade (RISE) - MDG Supplier Validation Error Message "Enter incoterm location 1"
entry.content:
Good day,

Firstly thank you for your help. 

We have recently upgraded to Rise with our S/4HANA system and in turn we are encountering some new and interesting features/events when working within MDG. when we maintain our Vendor/Supplier we now receive the following validation error message: "Enter incoterm location 1". 

Previously we did not encounter this and from Inspection I can see this is error message V2860  is being raised in a SAP standard program.

My question is why is this present now? and can we work around this?

Thanks again for the help

entry.title: MDG Free tier - Workflow or email not generated after BP creation
entry.content:
Hi all, I have the free-tie MDG subscription. I have tried out the functionality to create BPs and it works well. The only thing that is not working is when I create the BP - I would expect to recieive something in the inbox to either approve or reject the created BP. When I tried creating I created the BP however there was no workflow generated to the inbox to either approve or reject. 

What could be the issue here? Is there some added configuration that needs to be done or is the workflow steps not generated when you only have free-tier MDG? I have run the booster set-up for the MDG to work in a subaccout.
